name: WinCondition
_source: s;Simon;We won...{w} We really did it.{w}{br}Victory like this seemed impossible after what happened at home.
s;Luther;I felt the same, milord.{w} But it's good to know that New Dawn is not unbeatable.{w}{br}We should hold this feeling close as we continue to retake control of the region.
s;Simon;Aye. We'll take Castle Verstadt back yet.
